alert.note: Alert for Saline (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 9:24PM CDT until June 07 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR SALINE COUNTY... At 924 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Dorchester, or 25 miles south of Seward, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Crete, Wilber, Friend, Dorchester, Western, Tobias, Swanton, Swan Creek Reservoir Number 2, The Highway 41 and 15 South Junction, Swan Creek Wildlife Management Area, Blue River State Recreation Area, Walnut Creek Recreation Area and Willard Meyer Recreation Area. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
